body:
Hello All,
I would like to know how to make/model lens in radiance. So, Does anybody
know about how to make Lens material in Radiance. Please if some one knows
about it then let me know as soon as possible.
Thanks
Bye

--
With Regards
Neha Singhal
CEPT University
Ahmedabad
